subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The owners of last year’s Kentucky Derby winner, Big Brown, are back in pursuit of the Triple Crown after buying a 50 percent interest in I Want Revenge, who is favored to win the Wood Memorial on Saturday at Aqueduct.
snippet: The owners of last year’s Kentucky Derby winner, Big Brown, are back in pursuit of the Triple Crown after buying a 50 percent interest in I Want Revenge, who is favored to win the Wood Memorial on Saturday at Aqueduct.
